frame_offset.name: Frame Offset
frame_offset.description: Adds a frame offset when recording or playing macros

endscreen_button.name: Button at Endscreen
endscreen_button.description: Shows the menu button at the endscreen.

ffmpeg_path.name: ffmpeg.exe Path
ffmpeg_path.description: The path for ffmpeg.exe, needed to use render.

editor_keybinds.name: Keybinds on editor
editor_keybinds.description: Enables keybinds while on the level editor.

recording_only_keybinds.name: Keybinds only while recording
recording_only_keybinds.description: Keybinds only work while recording a macro.

level_settings_button.name: Show Button At Settings
level_settings_button.description: Shows the xdBot button in the level settings layer.

restore_page.name: Restore Settings Page
restore_page.description: Saves the page you were in when you closed the menu.

disable_speedhack.name: Auto Disable Speedhack
disable_speedhack.description: Disables Speedhack when exiting a level.

frame_fixes_limit.name: Frame Fixes Limit in FPS
frame_fixes_limit.description: Limits how many frame fixes per second there will be.

auto_stop_playing.name: Auto Stop Playing
auto_stop_playing.description: Stops playing the macro when it ends.
